content.text: Mr. Decker is a minor character who plays a role inÂ Diversity Day. He is one of Jim's major clients and his business is worth 25% of his commission. Throughout the episode, however, Jim is unable to make the sale due to distractions from both Michael and Dwight. Unfortunately, when Jim finally has time to get a hold of him, Mr. Decker has already made the sale with Dwight. Afterwards, Jim pulls out his congratulatory bottle of champagne and places it on Dwight's desk.
